About Me

This page tells you a little bit about me.

Projects

Below you can find information about all of the projects that I have undertaken over the past few years. Check them out!

Into Another Dimension (2022) by Epi Torres Into Another Dimension is a proof-of-concept project that implements a 4D physics engine and 4D rendering pipeline in Unity. Interact with hyperspheres, hyperboxes, and hypercapsules in this mind-boggling prototype! Code Demo
Game Bot (2021) by Epi Torres Game Bot is a project aimed at teaching programmers how to implement two reinforcement learning algorithms in Python in order to train a bot that plays Google Chrome's Dinosaur Game. Program and train your very own dino bot below! Code Demo
Core Crawler (2021) by Epi Torres & Jorge Zreik Core Crawler is a low-poly 3D video game where you are an astronaut exploring the center of a planet with only your grappling hook to get around. Swing through the procedurally generated world while you collect gems to increase your score while trying not to crash! Code Demo
Lucid (2019) by Epi Torres & Will Svoboda Lucid is a 3D first-person platformer where you are trapped in a tropical dream world. Collect hidden items throughout this world to craft different abilities to help you reach new areas and ultimately escape! Code Demo
EpiTorres.github.io is maintained by Epi Torres. This page was generated by GitHub Pages.
